channel.title: Behance Featured Projects
channel.description: The latest projects featured on the Behance

item.title: Lloyd
item.description: I utilized a professional 3D design program to create this project. This software allows me to have a 3D view of the sculpture and, at the same time, virtually cut out all the different surfaces of my sculpture and consider them on a 2D plane. In this way, I can perfectly understand shapes and sizes of any material that I choose to build my sculpture. Subsequently, I cut the PVC plates and assemble them together. The last step involves coating the PVC surface with a polyester layer to mask imperfections resulting from the building process and to impart singularity to the structure, rather than a collage of components.
item.content:encoded: I utilized a professional 3D design program to create this project. This software allows me to have a 3D view of the sculpture and, at the same time, virtually cut out all the different surfaces of my sculpture and consider them on a 2D plane. In this way, I can perfectly understand shapes and sizes of any material that I choose to build my sculpture. Subsequently, I cut the PVC plates and assemble them together. The last step involves coating the PVC surface with a polyester layer to mask imperfections resulting from the building process and to impart singularity to the structure, rather than a collage of components.

item.title: Tron: Legacy
item.description: The goal of this project was to create a series of images with some of the main Tron: Legacy characters. The final pieces were used for promotional purposes as well as merchandise.
item.content:encoded: The goal of this project was to create a series of images with some of the main Tron: Legacy characters. The final pieces were used for promotional purposes as well as merchandise.

item.title: Fogg
item.description: Fogg is a global Internet access solution. With Fogg travelers can now stay online when traveling for a favorable fixed cost. Bunch developed the identity based on the brand directions that were conceived by the suprb Kurppa Hosk. A stark and somewhat technical visual foundation is complemented by an inspiring blob ? while digital in nature, its 3D model carefully combines light, texture and space which brings depth in both print and digital format while maintaining its poetic essence. Also in charge of print production, Bunch was able to produce materials with great attention to detail, where the "borderless" theme is explored not only through typography and visuals but also materials, print processes and finishes.
item.content:encoded: Fogg is a global Internet access solution. With Fogg travelers can now stay online when traveling for a favorable fixed cost. Bunch developed the identity based on the brand directions that were conceived by the suprb Kurppa Hosk. A stark and somewhat technical visual foundation is complemented by an inspiring blob ? while digital in nature, its 3D model carefully combines light, texture and space which brings depth in both print and digital format while maintaining its poetic essence. Also in charge of print production, Bunch was able to produce materials with great attention to detail, where the "borderless" theme is explored not only through typography and visuals but also materials, print processes and finishes.

item.title: Lomography - La Sardina Pattern Cameras Edition
item.description: La Sardina Pattern Edition cameras and photo accordion books. These 35mm cameras are equipped with a wide-angle lens, multiple exposure capabilities, and a rewind dial. The vintage design of the camera reminds us to the fish tin cans. La Sardina plastic edition is packed in on a cardboard box simulating the Fish Market wooden crates. It is glueless and stores the contents in two different layers. The first layer includes the camera with flash (plus colors filters); the second layer stores the book, the poster & manual and an accordion photo album. I worked on the creative direction, concept development and product design management of the collection; including packaging, product, book design and worldwide marketing collateral material for the launch campaigns throughout the online, retail and wholesale channels. La Sardina Pattern Edition cameras, including its packaging, are products of the Lomographic Society International. They have been developed by the in-house design team.
item.content:encoded: La Sardina Pattern Edition cameras and photo accordion books. These 35mm cameras are equipped with a wide-angle lens, multiple exposure capabilities, and a rewind dial. The vintage design of the camera reminds us to the fish tin cans. La Sardina plastic edition is packed in on a cardboard box simulating the Fish Market wooden crates. It is glueless and stores the contents in two different layers. The first layer includes the camera with flash (plus colors filters); the second layer stores the book, the poster & manual and an accordion photo album. I worked on the creative direction, concept development and product design management of the collection; including packaging, product, book design and worldwide marketing collateral material for the launch campaigns throughout the online, retail and wholesale channels. La Sardina Pattern Edition cameras, including its packaging, are products of the Lomographic Society International. They have been developed by the in-house design team.

item.title: Calendario "Peixe 2013"
item.description: Calendario "PEIXE 2013" Muestra fotográfica desde la mirada de Marian Sánchez, Ramiro Fernández Stahlschmidt, Alejandra Mascareño y Gabriela Fonseca. Las fotografías realizadas combinan universos y temáticas múltiples en relación a los meses del año, y se conjugan con piezas específicas de Erika Baldo en diseño de indumentaria. La muestra podrá visitarse hasta el 21 de diciembre en la nave cultural. Equipo de trabajo: Diseño de Indumentaria: PEIXE, Erika Baldo. Fotografía: Marian Sánchez, Alejandra Mascareño, Gabriela Fonseca y Ramiro Fernández Stahlschmidt. Video: Alejandra Mascareño Música: Luis Zarate, Boris Rivas e Ignacio Moreno. Diseño gráfico: Robot y Mariano Cruz. Ilustración: Arte de tapa / Gastón Pacheco. Foto Octubre, "El Viaje" / Mariana Alloggia/ Estudio Coso. Make up, accesorios y diseño escenográfico: Alejandra Mascareño. Casting: Mariano Cruz, Ignacio Moreno, Ramiro Fernández Stahlschmidt, Erika Baldo y Marian Sánchez. Locaciones: Eugenia Trefontane y Teresita Lavarello. Reparto: Selene Frites, Ana Moreno, Nancy Colque, Bruno Rubia, Rosa Grillo, Némesis,Fabiola Caro Vega, Romina Lucero, Andrea Shen, Sandra Bustos, María José Concatti, Cristina Viale y Ximena da Costa. Texto critico: Laura Valdivieso y Silvana Gutierrez. Expografía: Silvana Gutiérrez
item.content:encoded: Calendario "PEIXE 2013" Muestra fotográfica desde la mirada de Marian Sánchez, Ramiro Fernández Stahlschmidt, Alejandra Mascareño y Gabriela Fonseca. Las fotografías realizadas combinan universos y temáticas múltiples en relación a los meses del año, y se conjugan con piezas específicas de Erika Baldo en diseño de indumentaria. La muestra podrá visitarse hasta el 21 de diciembre en la nave cultural. Equipo de trabajo: Diseño de Indumentaria: PEIXE, Erika Baldo. Fotografía: Marian Sánchez, Alejandra Mascareño, Gabriela Fonseca y Ramiro Fernández Stahlschmidt. Video: Alejandra Mascareño Música: Luis Zarate, Boris Rivas e Ignacio Moreno. Diseño gráfico: Robot y Mariano Cruz. Ilustración: Arte de tapa / Gastón Pacheco. Foto Octubre, "El Viaje" / Mariana Alloggia/ Estudio Coso. Make up, accesorios y diseño escenográfico: Alejandra Mascareño. Casting: Mariano Cruz, Ignacio Moreno, Ramiro Fernández Stahlschmidt, Erika Baldo y Marian Sánchez. Locaciones: Eugenia Trefontane y Teresita Lavarello. Reparto: Selene Frites, Ana Moreno, Nancy Colque, Bruno Rubia, Rosa Grillo, Némesis,Fabiola Caro Vega, Romina Lucero, Andrea Shen, Sandra Bustos, María José Concatti, Cristina Viale y Ximena da Costa. Texto critico: Laura Valdivieso y Silvana Gutierrez. Expografía: Silvana Gutiérrez

item.title: De Correspondent
item.description: De Correspondent is a crowdfunding project to start a new digital-only, subscription based news publication. Holding in-depth, quality journalism in higher regard than standard newsroom reporting, it will transform subscribers into shareholders and turn away from advertisers in exchange for partners. De Correspondent will be ambitious in its ideals and humble in its wisdom.
item.content:encoded: De Correspondent is a crowdfunding project to start a new digital-only, subscription based news publication. Holding in-depth, quality journalism in higher regard than standard newsroom reporting, it will transform subscribers into shareholders and turn away from advertisers in exchange for partners. De Correspondent will be ambitious in its ideals and humble in its wisdom.

item.title: 'Delicious' - Hong Kong Airport billboard graphics
item.description: Embroidered graphics created for Hong Kong Airport. The word "Delicious" was embroidered in six languages representing the different cuisines offered in the airport food halls. The word is spelled out using food from the various regions. Taking advantage of the texture and tactility of needlework we had the pleasure of creating these custom headlines out of very tasty food.
item.content:encoded: Embroidered graphics created for Hong Kong Airport. The word "Delicious" was embroidered in six languages representing the different cuisines offered in the airport food halls. The word is spelled out using food from the various regions. Taking advantage of the texture and tactility of needlework we had the pleasure of creating these custom headlines out of very tasty food.

item.title: Plus X Creative Partner Identity Design
item.description: Plus X has connotations of a message that ? We Add Experience for Your Brand.? Brand experience design means providing consumers with valuable brand experience through integrated online and offline designs based on the consistent brand strategy. Key brand messages or service functions can be effectively delivered when various media channels meet strategic marketing. In order to symbolize the purpose of the establishment of Plus X, the corporate symbol was designed with ?+? and ?x? which are considered most fundamental signs. We tried to maintain ?+X? for symbolizing our corporate identity,
item.content:encoded: Plus X has connotations of a message that ? We Add Experience for Your Brand.? Brand experience design means providing consumers with valuable brand experience through integrated online and offline designs based on the consistent brand strategy. Key brand messages or service functions can be effectively delivered when various media channels meet strategic marketing. In order to symbolize the purpose of the establishment of Plus X, the corporate symbol was designed with ?+? and ?x? which are considered most fundamental signs. We tried to maintain ?+X? for symbolizing our corporate identity,

item.title: Math:Rules - Strange Attractors
item.description: I wanted to create a series of pictures representing mathematical shapes on white background, like a "tribute to mathematics" that I often use in my work. I chose the "strange attractors" for their dynamic forms and "chaotic feel". Because I'm not a mathematician, I relied on several sites. Including one especially, very complete with free plugins for Cinema 4D making possible to configure these shapes easily. The site is in German, but Google translate did the job very well, so many thanks to the author !
item.content:encoded: I wanted to create a series of pictures representing mathematical shapes on white background, like a "tribute to mathematics" that I often use in my work. I chose the "strange attractors" for their dynamic forms and "chaotic feel". Because I'm not a mathematician, I relied on several sites. Including one especially, very complete with free plugins for Cinema 4D making possible to configure these shapes easily. The site is in German, but Google translate did the job very well, so many thanks to the author !

item.title: Vikings
item.description: Our task was to create a logo that would show the spirit of the Vikings' culture in its several main elements. In one symbol we needed to capture the multiple dimension of the nation. At the same time in the teaser we had to focus on how all the elements in logo are brought to life and coexist in Vikings' everyday life.
item.content:encoded: Our task was to create a logo that would show the spirit of the Vikings' culture in its several main elements. In one symbol we needed to capture the multiple dimension of the nation. At the same time in the teaser we had to focus on how all the elements in logo are brought to life and coexist in Vikings' everyday life.

item.title: WIDE AWAKE
item.description: The ?Global Trend Book? presents the latest automotive colours from Europe, the Asia-Pacific region and North America and explains trend backgrounds. One particular challenge was to develop a concept and a visual language which is accepted in both global and regional context. The book is divided into a trend part and an expandable, removable colour part for a high degree of flexibility in use. The parallel arrangement of both parts and the additional, visual-based orientation system ensures a clear presentation. Behold and awaken!
item.content:encoded: The ?Global Trend Book? presents the latest automotive colours from Europe, the Asia-Pacific region and North America and explains trend backgrounds. One particular challenge was to develop a concept and a visual language which is accepted in both global and regional context. The book is divided into a trend part and an expandable, removable colour part for a high degree of flexibility in use. The parallel arrangement of both parts and the additional, visual-based orientation system ensures a clear presentation. Behold and awaken!

item.title: Vevo
item.description: Music in Full Force We rebranded the #1 music video and entertainment platform to embody the thrill of discovering and experiencing the world?s best music. We?ve introduced a streamlined, lowercase logotype, creating a brand that celebrates fans. Expressive, in-your-face graphics, rich color, and strong typography reflect an infectious passion for music. A full motion graphics package for VEVO TV, the new 24-hour streaming video channel, brings music to life.
item.content:encoded: Music in Full Force We rebranded the #1 music video and entertainment platform to embody the thrill of discovering and experiencing the world?s best music. We?ve introduced a streamlined, lowercase logotype, creating a brand that celebrates fans. Expressive, in-your-face graphics, rich color, and strong typography reflect an infectious passion for music. A full motion graphics package for VEVO TV, the new 24-hour streaming video channel, brings music to life.
